drug.name: potassium chloride in sterile water for injection inj BAG

instruction.value: DAY 1 of 21. Administer dose at maximum rate of 10 mmol/hour and at a maximum concentration of 10 mml/100 mL. (20 mmol is provided by 2 x potassium chloride 10 mmol/100 mL bags)
DAY 2 of 21. Administer dose at maximum rate of 10 mmol/hour and at a maximum concentration of 10 mml/100 mL. (20 mmol is provided by 2 x potassium chloride 10 mmol/100 mL bags)
DAY 3 of 21. Administer dose at maximum rate of 10 mmol/hour and at a maximum concentration of 10 mml/100 mL. (20 mmol is provided by 2 x potassium chloride 10 mmol/100 mL bags)
